values.description: Fixed a small trivial syntax error in link.sdf. Replaced faulty 'element' with  'attribute', now link damping can be configured from the .world files.
values.title: Fix syntax error in link.sdf

summary.raw: Fixed a small trivial syntax error in link.sdf. Replaced faulty 'element' with  'attribute', now link damping can be configured from the .world files.
summary.html: Fixed a small trivial syntax error in link.sdf. Replaced faulty 'element' with 'attribute', now link damping can be configured from the .world files.

values.reason:
Thanks for all the work, but the SDF is correct. Usage is:
<damping>
  <linear>0.1</linear>
  <angular>0.1</angular>
</damping>

values.description:
changes to Nate's comments added.

Mainly a big merge into dev.  This patch also contains:
 - Fixes so bullet compiles.
 - Fix a start up deadlock race condition in ConnectionManager.
 - Fix some places where switching to Scoped joint names not complete.
 - Major refactor of JointController::SetJointPosition.  It's now much cleaner.
   - Added set_joint.cc and set_pose_loop.cc for testing purposes.
Hard to break up the merge into smaller patches because most of the changes came from different merges upstream.
values.title: merging into dev and a few fixes

summary.raw:
changes to Nate's comments added.

Mainly a big merge into dev.  This patch also contains:
 - Fixes so bullet compiles.
 - Fix a start up deadlock race condition in ConnectionManager.
 - Fix some places where switching to Scoped joint names not complete.
 - Major refactor of JointController::SetJointPosition.  It's now much cleaner.
   - Added set_joint.cc and set_pose_loop.cc for testing purposes.
Hard to break up the merge into smaller patches because most of the changes came from different merges upstream.
summary.html:
changes to Nate's comments added.

Mainly a big merge into dev. This patch also contains: - Fixes so bullet compiles. - Fix a start up deadlock race condition in ConnectionManager. - Fix some places where switching to Scoped joint names not complete. - Major refactor of JointController::SetJointPosition. It's now much cleaner. - Added set_joint.cc and set_pose_loop.cc for testing purposes. Hard to break up the merge into smaller patches because most of the changes came from different merges upstream.

values.description:
tic-toc the switch to using fully scoped joint names by one cycle?

update and merge loops per comment.

if starting gzclient before gzserver finishes loading models, gzserver segfaults in the Publisher.cc:91.  This patches the error by moving the mutex lock earlier.
values.title: GetJoint falls back to unscoped name and give user a warning and Patch for startup race condition induced segfault

summary.raw:
tic-toc the switch to using fully scoped joint names by one cycle?

update and merge loops per comment.

if starting gzclient before gzserver finishes loading models, gzserver segfaults in the Publisher.cc:91.  This patches the error by moving the mutex lock earlier.
summary.html:
tic-toc the switch to using fully scoped joint names by one cycle?

update and merge loops per comment.

if starting gzclient before gzserver finishes loading models, gzserver segfaults in the Publisher.cc:91. This patches the error by moving the mutex lock earlier.

values.description:
bug fix:  break after calling vector.erase.
update per change param name from joint to _joint.

Change mutex for SetWorldPose to non-recursive, made private, add accessor.
Fix Joint detach, previously stored reference in parent and child links.
Fix URDF converter:  <mesh filename="..."/> to <mesh><uri>.  muted bunch of debug messages.

summary.raw:
bug fix:  break after calling vector.erase.
update per change param name from joint to _joint.

Change mutex for SetWorldPose to non-recursive, made private, add accessor.
Fix Joint detach, previously stored reference in parent and child links.
Fix URDF converter:  <mesh filename="..."/> to <mesh><uri>.  muted bunch of debug messages.
summary.html:
bug fix: break after calling vector.erase. update per change param name from joint to _joint.

Change mutex for SetWorldPose to non-recursive, made private, add accessor. Fix Joint detach, previously stored reference in parent and child links. Fix URDF converter: <mesh filename="..."/> to <mesh><uri>. muted bunch of debug messages.

values.description:
* This pull request goes along with the drcsim pull request I'm about to create that updates all the model manifest.xml files.
* The updated manifest.xml files are all documented here: http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Model_database
  * Please review the wiki documentation. I want this to be the last time the model database is updated before the kickoff.

* The setup.sh has changed to point to http://gazebosim.org/models. This is a better URI, and leaves the old database in place for current users.

* ModelDatabase: Improved error handling, and now parses the new manifest.xml files.
* SystemPaths: Now uses boost::filesystem for path generation and file testing.
values.title: Model database manifest.xml fix

summary.raw:
* This pull request goes along with the drcsim pull request I'm about to create that updates all the model manifest.xml files.
* The updated manifest.xml files are all documented here: http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Model_database
  * Please review the wiki documentation. I want this to be the last time the model database is updated before the kickoff.

* The setup.sh has changed to point to http://gazebosim.org/models. This is a better URI, and leaves the old database in place for current users.

* ModelDatabase: Improved error handling, and now parses the new manifest.xml files.
* SystemPaths: Now uses boost::filesystem for path generation and file testing.
summary.html:
• This pull request goes along with the drcsim pull request I'm about to create that updates all the model manifest.xml files.
  • The updated manifest.xml files are all documented here: http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Model_database

  • Please review the wiki documentation. I want this to be the last time the model database is updated before the kickoff.

  • The setup.sh has changed to point to http://gazebosim.org/models. This is a better URI, and leaves the old database in place for current users.

  • ModelDatabase: Improved error handling, and now parses the new manifest.xml files.

  • SystemPaths: Now uses boost::filesystem for path generation and file testing.

values.description:
minor:  update comments, no code changes

camelCase!

plugins_loaded_ renamed to plugins_loaded (no trailing underscore). Move World::LoadPlugins to after first UpdatePhysics call so we are not artificially advancing the update step (caught by physics.cc unit test).


fixes dynamic plugin loading for models.  for some reason, static bool is initialize across different models.
values.title: moving bool: first in Model and World plugin loading to class memeber plugins_loaded_

summary.raw:
minor:  update comments, no code changes

camelCase!

plugins_loaded_ renamed to plugins_loaded (no trailing underscore). Move World::LoadPlugins to after first UpdatePhysics call so we are not artificially advancing the update step (caught by physics.cc unit test).


fixes dynamic plugin loading for models.  for some reason, static bool is initialize across different models.
summary.html:
minor: update comments, no code changes

camelCase!

plugins_loaded_ renamed to plugins_loaded (no trailing underscore). Move World::LoadPlugins to after first UpdatePhysics call so we are not artificially advancing the update step (caught by physics.cc unit test).

fixes dynamic plugin loading for models. for some reason, static bool is initialize across different models.

values.description:
fix sensor initializaiton race condition.

a model plugin looking for a sensor in its Load() function by calling

sensors::SensorManager::Instance()->GetSensor( name );

could fail based on how fast SensorManger::Update is called in a separate thread.

The solution here is to add a check to make sure all sensors in SensorManager have been initialized before calling Model::LoadPlugins().
values.title: fix sensor initializaiton race condition.

summary.raw:
fix sensor initializaiton race condition.

a model plugin looking for a sensor in its Load() function by calling

sensors::SensorManager::Instance()->GetSensor( name );

could fail based on how fast SensorManger::Update is called in a separate thread.

The solution here is to add a check to make sure all sensors in SensorManager have been initialized before calling Model::LoadPlugins().
summary.html:
fix sensor initializaiton race condition.

a model plugin looking for a sensor in its Load() function by calling

sensors::SensorManager::Instance()->GetSensor( name );

could fail based on how fast SensorManger::Update is called in a separate thread.

The solution here is to add a check to make sure all sensors in SensorManager have been initialized before calling Model::LoadPlugins().

values.description:
patch to fix spurious test failures:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64/17/testReport/(root)/PhysicsTest/CollisionTest/

due to occasional throttling of physics update, but World::stepInc still got decremented.
values.title: fix proper World::stepInc count (we were getting non-updates with World::StepWorld due to throttling).  Removed old comment, not needed anaymore.
